user.title: TeamSnap OAuth Credentials
user.description:
To connect Home Assistant to TeamSnap, you need to create an OAuth application first.

**Step 1:** Go to [auth.teamsnap.com](https://auth.teamsnap.com) and sign in to your TeamSnap account.

**Step 2:** Create a new OAuth application and set the redirect URI to:
`{redirect_uri}`

**Step 3:** Copy your Client ID and Client Secret from the TeamSnap OAuth application, then enter them below.

pick_implementation.title: Pick Authentication Method
pick_implementation.description: Please pick how you want to authenticate with TeamSnap.

error.oauth_setup_error: Unable to initialize OAuth flow. Please ensure your Client ID and Client Secret are correct and try again.
error.missing_configuration: OAuth configuration is missing. Please verify your Client ID and Client Secret are correct, and that the redirect URI in your TeamSnap OAuth app matches: {redirect_uri}
